name: Fusion by Peter
tagline: My little presence on the web
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page.

This is my little spot to share my work as well as useful things I've learnt in python, Fortran and linux. For example, the extension to f90-mode in emacs for [Fortran namelists](https://github.com/ZedThree/f90-namelist-mode), written with Dave Dickinson.

This is currently waiting for me to hack this github theme into a jekyll template so I can use it as a blog.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
